title: State-of-the-art fitness center, Stand-up showers, Spacious floorplans
posting_body: ['Scott Street Lofts', '1320 Scott St, Houston, TX, 77003', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 36', 'OR Text', '36', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'BRAND NEW SENIOR LIVING COMMUNITY!!!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath', 'Are you searching for a welcoming senior apartment in Houston, Texas?', 'Let me introduce you to a brand new and affordable apartment community coming soon to our neighborhood.', 'Scott Street Loft apartments are coming soon in the East Downtown Houston area near Interstates 45 and 69, making getting around town a breeze.', 'Enjoy A lifestyle of quality and convenience.', 'Features', '- Built-in computer desk', '- Garden Bathtubs', '- In-unit washer/dryer', '- Granite countertops with islands', '- Spacious floorplans', '- Stand-up showers', 'Community Amenities', '- Onsite hair salon', '- State-of-the-art fitness center', '- Clubhouse with a full kitchen and fireplace', '- On-site garage parking', '- Poolside cabana', '- Sparkling swimming pool', 'Driving Directions', "Exit 45 on Scott Street go under 45 come 2 lights down on make U turn on street Polk and make a quick right on Sampson Street the Scott Street Loft's will be on your left-hand side", 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Regarding communities that allow pets, only dogs, cats fish and birds are allowed, no more than two (2) animals of any kind are permitted per apartment.', 'Dogs and Cats will require an additional deposit of $150 foe each animal as well as a $150 non-refundable', 'fee.', 'Pet rent of $10 per month per pet will be required.', 'Dogs whose breed or dominant breed weight exceeds 99 lbs.at full maturity are restricted pet interviews are required.', 'Be prepared to present vaccination records and provide pictures upon interview pets must be restrained on a leash always in common areas Pet owners ae required to walk pets in the designated areas and will be responsible for cleaning and disposing of pet waste from these areas.', 'Service Animals', 'Specific animals, breed, number, weight, restrictions, pet rules, and pet deposits will not apply to households having qualified service/assistance animal(s).', 'Income Requirements:', 'Applicants must make at least 2X the monthly rent amount', 'k3HbXSCT6']
